title: How to Make Tea Using a Coffee Pot

steps.title: Fill the glass carafe with water and pour it's contents into the reservoir just like when making a regular coffee.
steps.content: Fill the glass carafe with water and pour it's contents into the reservoir just like when making a regular coffee.

steps.title: Remove and rinse the filter basket from previous brews of either coffee or tea.
steps.content: Remove and rinse the filter basket from previous brews of either coffee or tea.

steps.title: Select your choice of teas.
steps.content: Select your choice of teas . [1] X Research source Use approximately one teabag per one cup of water. Removing the filter, place the tea bags into the basket and back into its compartment. Replace the carafe on the plate then turn the coffee maker on. (For stronger tea and less mess, put the teabags inside the carafe instead in the filter basket).

steps.title: Wait until the tea is done brewing, and enjoy!
steps.content: Wait until the tea is done brewing , and enjoy!

steps.title: Brew hot water using the coffee maker by pouring water into the reservoir, and turning the machine on until the water has boiled.
steps.content: Brew hot water using the coffee maker by pouring water into the reservoir, and turning the machine on until the water has boiled.

steps.title: Place the teabag in your cup and pour the hot water in.
steps.content: Place the teabag in your cup and pour the hot water in.

steps.title: Soak the tea bag for three minutes.
steps.content: Soak the tea bag for three minutes. [2] X Research source Enjoy!
